trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: Mortlock can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Mortlock makes two attacks with his greatclub.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) bludgeoning damage if Mortlock has taken any damage since his last turn.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.
